mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (user_id, title, content, images, video, post_type, category, status, like_count, comment_count, view_count, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{images}, #{video}, #{post_type}, #{category}, #{status}, #{like_count}, #{comment_count}, #{view_count}, #{create_time}, #{update_time})
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, a.username, a.avatar FROM post p LEFT JOIN account a ON p.user_id = a.id WHERE p.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE post SET view_count = view_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE post SET like_count = like_count + #{increment} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE post SET comment_count = comment_count + #{increment} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.user_id, p.title, p.content, p.category, p.status, p.like_count, p.comment_count, p.view_count, p.create_time, a.username, a.avatar FROM post p LEFT JOIN account a ON p.user_id = a.id WHERE p.status = #{status} ORDER BY p.create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post WHERE status = #{status}
SELECT category AS name, COUNT(*) AS value FROM post WHERE status = 1 GROUP BY category
